name: Yule Lad Mayhem
description:
Note: This was exported for 1440x900 at a minimum. Please do not play in a tiny browser window, it won't work if you must play in a tiny browser window.

Made for the b3agz Jam 2023, to the theme of "There is no spoon"

Get back your spoon from the miserable little yule lad goblin that stole it so he can lick it. You need to finish your soup to open your new clothes or else the yule cat will eat you.

What's missing that we wanted to do, but probably won't follow up on:

  • More Yule Lads
  • Any semblance of balance
  • More floors
  • Physics
  • Angry icelandic shouting.
  • Candle and Darkness
  • Better broom swinging.
  • Sausage physics
  • Yule cat invading your house and fending it off with lutefisk
